metadata.title: CVE-2018-6358 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The printDefineFont2 function (util/listfdb.c) in libming through 0.4.8 isvulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, which may allow attackers tocause a denial of service or unspecified other impact via a crafted FDBfile.

criterions.comment: ming: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
